name: usps-webtools-openapi
description: A collection of OpenAPI specifications for USPS WebTools APIs

scripts.redoc: redoc-cli bundle $npm_package_config_specfile -t actions/redoc/template.hbs --templateOptions.LOB_ASSETS_URL=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com  --templateOptions.keywords="Direct Mail, Address Verification" --templateOptions.description="Open source developer documentation for USPS Webtool's API. Working together to improve the developer experience for everyone." --templateOptions.image=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com/marketing/opengraph2.png --options=docs/redocOptions.json --title="USPS WebTools API opensource documentation" -o docs/index.html
scripts.redoc2: redoc-cli bundle $npm_package_config_specfile2 -t actions/redoc/template.hbs --templateOptions.LOB_ASSETS_URL=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com  --templateOptions.keywords="Direct Mail, Address Verification" --templateOptions.description="Open source developer documentation for USPS Webtool's API. Working together to improve the developer experience for everyone." --templateOptions.image=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/public.lob.com/marketing/opengraph2.png --options=docs/redocOptions.json --title="USPS WebTools API opensource documentation" -o docs/index2.html

author: Lob Developer Experience Team
